text: Asterodon is a genus of two species of crust fungi in the family Hymenochaetaceae. Several species once placed in this genus were transferred to Pseudasterodon. ==Species list== *Asterodon albus Rick 1959 *Asterodon ferruginosus Pat. 189 ==References== Category:Hymenochaetaceae Category:Agaricomycetes genera
title: Asterodon
